about_the_game:
Face different situations that are the daily life of tower controllers around the world, from communication failures to terrorist attacks, you will learn to work under a lot of pressure as you advance between the different levels.

As and Air Traffic Controller your mission is to control the air drome by moving, landing and depart planes, get ready to face a different puzzle in every level that will put your knowledge to the test, this game will contain over 20 different levels full of real life situations and adrenaline.
This game has a badge system that will reward you if you manage to pass the level with three stars, do you have what it takes to unlock all available badges and become the legendary Air Traffic Controller?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k @3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX9-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 4GB OR AMD RX 580 4GB OR 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX9-compatible sound card

short_description: Manage, control and guarantee the safety of all your flights in Torre Las Américas, a simulator based on real air traffic controller procedures, which will put you to the test through the different challenges that the guardians of the sky experience every day. Now with voice recognition feature!

English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
